channel.title: Courses on Bradin Rohde
channel.description: Recent content in Courses on Bradin Rohde

item.title: PC1530 - Intro to Ophcrack
item.author: bradinrohde0@gmail.com (Bradin Rohde)
item.description: An introductory lesson to Ophcrack. This lesson covers the basics of rainbow tables, how to install them, using them to crack unsalted LM and NTLM hashes.

item.title: PC1520 - Intro to John the Ripper
item.author: bradinrohde0@gmail.com (Bradin Rohde)
item.description: An introductiory lesson to JohnTheRipper. This lesson covers the wordlist, single crack, incremental, and mask attack modes.

item.title: PC1510 - Intro to Hashcat
item.author: bradinrohde0@gmail.com (Bradin Rohde)
item.description: An introductory lesson to Hashcat. This lesson will cover the usage of the dictionary, combinator, brute force, and hybrid attack modes

item.title: PC1010 - Intro to Password Cracking
item.author: bradinrohde0@gmail.com (Bradin Rohde)
item.description: An introductory lesson for password cracking. This lesson covers the idea behind using hashes, how they are cracked, and various types of password attacks.

item.title: Password Cracking Course
item.author: bradinrohde0@gmail.com (Bradin Rohde)
item.description:
This course is actively being written. Anything with an asterisk is currently unfinished. More courses to come!

Beginner Courses

PC1010 - Intro to Password Cracking

An introductory lesson for password cracking. Covers the idea behind using hashes, how they are cracked, and various types of offline password attacks.

PC1510 - Intro to Hashcat

An introductory lesson to Hashcat. This lesson will cover the usage of the dictionary, combinator, brute force, and hybrid attack modes.
